description.value: Forbidding valleys and sheer cliffs can't curb your vows to reunite the lost. You can cast your choice of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Gentle Landing] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Jump] as a primal innate spell once per day. At 9th level, these spells are heightened to 3rd rank.

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Tian Xia Character Guide
